name: Save new ParseHub data as Google Sheets files in Drive
description: This scenario can be run at specific intervals to retrieve the latest data of a ParseHub project. Make will automatically extract, save and convert the data in a format directly compatible with Google Sheets, such as [this example file](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zInrdXb-2NufVVgz3ykq9x9jXwzDrUj0kr2-vxGFeDM/edit?usp=sharing).
